content: easy fingerless mitts by katherine stempien ©2011 this pattern is universal for a right or left handed mitt which makes it easy size women s one-size men s s-l - add stitches to increase width as needed - after working the thumb you can adjust the length of finger portion of the mitt to accommodate a number of lengths as needed materials 3 us 7 double point needles 2 stitch markers your favorite worsted weight yarn extra yarn in a different color to use as a place holder/marker abbreviations k = knit p = purl m1 = make one increase method used pick up stitch below and place on left hand needle then knit into the back of the stitch adding a stitch to your right needle thus making one body part 1 start at the cuff and work up toward the fingers cast on 32 stitches use 2 needles and place 16 stitches on each join for knitting in the round being careful not to twist i place a yarn of a different color to mark the start this helps me know i ve gone a full round when using double sided needles round 1-14 k1 p1 - ribbing for 14 row round 15-18 k - for 4 row stockinette stitch gusset part 1 increase for thumb opening round 1 k15 place marker m1 k1 on first needle k1 m1 place marker k15 on second needle round 2 k slipping all markers round 3 k slipping all markers **repeat rounds 1-3 until you have 16 stitches between the markers don t forget to k last 2 row after gaining 16 stitches body part 2 round 1 k16 place the next 14 stitches on a holder for later i use yarn of a different color k16 round 2-5 k - for 4 row stockinette stitch… this is where you d add to increase for hand length i might do 7 row next time as my hands are rather long round 6-9 k1 p1 - ribbing for 4 row bind-off in pattern and weave in the end this completes the body of the mitt gusset part 2 go back and pick up thumb stitches put 7 stitches on one needle and 7 on a second needle join for knitting in the round being careful not to twist round 1-4 knit bind-off this will create a thumb extension be sure to weave in ends and close gap at thumb connection repeat for second mitt and - you are done
